title: JAPAN FROM ABOVE: Gifts from the Mountains

episodes.description: JAPAN FROM ABOVE takes you on an aerial journey across Japan. Enjoy a bird's-eye view of Japan's amazingly diverse landscapes, as well as intimate portraits of people leading contrasting lives.
episodes.subtitle: Co-production between NHK, Gedeon Programmes, ZDF Arte, and Voyage
episodes.title: JAPAN FROM ABOVE: Gifts from the Mountains
